body_html:
Remove the control dependency block? It depends on what you're trying to achieve... if the variable assigns can happen in any order, you don't need the control dependencies and you can run in parallel. If the assigns must happen in order, then you can't run them in parallel and this is enforced via control deps.

Note that map_fn calls tf.while_loop() under the hood, but doesn't add any control dependencies. So that's an example of parallel execution using while loop.

body:
Remove the control dependency block? It depends on what you're trying to achieve... if the variable assigns can happen in any order, you don't need the control dependencies and you can run in parallel. If the assigns must happen in order, then you can't run them in parallel and this is enforced via control deps.

Note that map_fn calls tf.while_loop() under the hood, but doesn't add any control dependencies. So that's an example of parallel execution using while loop.
